statements: SELECT * FROM ReliefEfforts
SELECT location, date FROM ReliefEfforts WHERE aid_amount > 1000
SELECT impact_rating, location, date FROM ReliefEfforts ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM ReliefEfforts WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT SUM(aid_amount) FROM ReliefEfforts GROUP BY location
SELECT relief_id, location, date, aid_amount, impact_rating FROM ReliefEfforts WHERE aid_amount > 5000 ORDER BY date DESC, impact_rating ASC
SELECT * FROM ReliefEfforts WHERE location='California' AND impact_rating > 8 ORDER BY aid_amount DESC
SELECT location, SUM(aid_amount) AS total_aid FROM ReliefEfforts GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(relief_id) > 5 ORDER BY total_aid DESC
SELECT relief_id, location, date, impact_rating FROM ReliefEfforts WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY impact_rating DESC, date ASC
SELECT location, AVG(impact_rating) AS avg_rating FROM ReliefEfforts GROUP BY location HAVING AVG(impact_rating) > 5 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM ReliefEfforts;
SELECT location, date FROM ReliefEfforts ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT relief_id, total_expenses FROM ReliefEfforts WHERE total_expenses > 5000;
SELECT * FROM EvaluationMetrics WHERE impact_score > 80;
SELECT location, total_expenses FROM ReliefEfforts WHERE total_expenses < 10000 ORDER BY total_expenses ASC;
SELECT * FROM ReliefEfforts WHERE total_expenses > 5000 ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT relief_id, location, total_expenses FROM ReliefEfforts WHERE location LIKE 'C%'
SELECT R.location, E.effectiveness_rating FROM ReliefEfforts R JOIN EvaluationMetrics E ON R.relief_id = E.relief_id WHERE E.impact_score > 80 ORDER BY R.location ASC
SELECT AVG(total_expenses) AS avg_expenses FROM ReliefEfforts
SELECT * FROM EvaluationMetrics WHERE relief_id IN (SELECT relief_id FROM ReliefEfforts WHERE date > '2021-01-01')
SELECT * FROM disaster_areas
SELECT area_name, relief_efforts FROM disaster_areas
SELECT supply_name, quantity FROM relief_supplies
SELECT area_id, area_name FROM disaster_areas ORDER BY area_id DESC
SELECT worker_name, area_name FROM relief_workers JOIN disaster_areas ON relief_workers.area_id = disaster_areas.area_id
SELECT * FROM disaster_areas ORDER BY area_id DESC;
SELECT area_id, area_name, relief_efforts FROM disaster_areas WHERE area_id = 3;
SELECT DISTINCT area_name FROM disaster_areas WHERE relief_efforts > 50;
SELECT area_name, relief_efforts FROM disaster_areas JOIN relief_workers ON disaster_areas.area_id = relief_workers.area_id WHERE relief_workers.worker_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT area_name, supply_name, quantity FROM disaster_areas JOIN relief_supplies ON disaster_areas.area_id = relief_supplies.supply_id WHERE quantity < 100;
SELECT * FROM relief_efforts;
SELECT organization_id, amount_spent FROM relief_efforts WHERE success = TRUE;
SELECT location_id, city, country FROM locations WHERE population > 100000;
SELECT name, type, location FROM organizations ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT donor_id, organization_id, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donors WHERE donation_amount > 500 ORDER BY donation_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM relief_efforts WHERE amount_spent > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT organization_id, amount_spent FROM relief_efforts WHERE success = TRUE ORDER BY amount_spent DESC;
SELECT o.name, l.city, r.amount_spent FROM organizations o JOIN locations l ON o.location = l.name JOIN relief_efforts r ON o.organization_id = r.organization_id WHERE r.success = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM donors WHERE donation_amount >= 500;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT * FROM AreaImpact;
SELECT relief_id, location, start_date FROM ReliefEfforts WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Volunteers WHERE skills IS NOT NULL;
SELECT donor_name, amount, donation_date FROM Donations ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT metric_id, relief_id, metric_type, metric_value FROM SuccessMetrics WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Donations WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT relief_id, location, start_date FROM ReliefEfforts WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT relief_id, location FROM ReliefEfforts WHERE location LIKE 'C%' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT relief_id, start_date, end_date FROM ReliefEfforts WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT d.donation_id, d.donor_name, d.amount, r.location FROM Donations d JOIN ReliefEfforts r ON r.relief_id = d.donation_id;
